HEART_CONTAINERS.SettingsContainerSizeHi: Size of each heart container. Default is 10 hit points per heart.
HEART_CONTAINERS.SettingsEnableHeartCont: Show the heart containers in the ui when you have a character assigned to your user.
HEART_CONTAINERS.SettingsPathNameValueHi: The data path to the current hit points on actors. Shown in red.
HEART_CONTAINERS.SettingsPathNameMaxHint: The data path to the maximum hit points on actors.
HEART_CONTAINERS.SettingsPathNameTempHin: The data path to the temporary hit points on actors. Shown in blue.
HEART_CONTAINERS.SettingsPathNameTempmax: The data path to a value that increases the maximum hit points on actors. Shown in yellow.
HEART_CONTAINERS.SettingsFontAwesomeIcon: The icon used for the 'hearts'. The default is 'fa-heart. Note that not all icons have an 'empty' equivalent. You can browse free icons here: https://fontawesome.com/v6/search?o=r&m=free
